description.narrative: The project will upgrade the electric power system, increase efficiency, reliability and quality of supply through physical investments in the power infrastructure of the state of Bihar, coupled with a capacity development component. Project investments include installation of new, and renovation and modernization (R&M) of existing transmission substations; installation of new, and reinforcement of existing transmission lines; and improving of distribution systems in seven towns (Bihar Sharif, Motihari, Bettiah, Samastipur, Begusarai, Ara and Buxor) in Bihar.

participating-org.narrative: Bihar State Power Holding Company Limited

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved and expanded transmission and distribution (T&D) capacity, increased T&D system efficiency, and enhanced quality and reliability of service in Bihar.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

Distribution system in Bihar will be capable of transmitting an additional 472,579 MWh c to consumers annually due to distribution capacity enhancement in the 4 distribution circles covered by the project by end 2015.

description.narrative: Improved and expanded transmission and distribution (T&D) capacity, increased T&D system efficiency, and enhanced quality and reliability of service in Bihar.

title.narrative: Technical and commercial electrical energy losses reduced by at least 3% from current level, by 2016 in the 4 distribution circles covered by the project.

description.narrative: Improved and expanded transmission and distribution (T&D) capacity, increased T&D system efficiency, and enhanced quality and reliability of service in Bihar.

title.narrative: Transmission system in Bihar will be able to handle an additional 270 MW b of additional peak demand in the 4 distribution circles covered by the project by end 2015

description.narrative: Improved and expanded transmission and distribution (T&D) capacity, increased T&D system efficiency, and enhanced quality and reliability of service in Bihar.
